Text:
Hail, [*] Kingdom of Heaven!
Hail, Dwelling of Angels!
Hail, Your Divine Will!
On earth as it is in heaven.

Rejoice, glorious Kingdom,
Beautiful above all others!
Hail, Splendid Radiance.
Call out to Christ with us.
Changes: 2023-08-30 - Paul Prins: Update the casing of Gods pronouns.
2022-09-01 - Paul Prins: Ends less triumphal for Lent, Good Friday, and Holy Saturday.
2022-08-31 - Paul Prins, Jordan Prins: Created this Antiphon.
